thought: To craft a mushroom_stew, I need to place a bowl, a brown_mushroom, and a red_mushroom in the crafting grid. I have done this, so I will move the mushroom_stew from the crafting slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 12).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 1
